template_description: Standard template for service_architecture.json files based on UAF definitions
purpose: Forms the largest known organization of matter, creating filaments and voids across the universe. Components: Galaxy clusters, superclusters, intergalactic medium.

interfaces.name: Cosmic Web Interaction
interfaces.description: The cosmic web is the large-scale structure of the universe, consisting of filaments of galaxies and matter separated by vast voids, shaped by gravity and cosmic expansion.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources. See: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cosmic_web, https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2016/nasa-s-supercomputers-unravel-the-mysteries-of-the-cosmic-web
